item.description:
Not Your Average Joe's, located at the Cape Cod Mall, offers what's called: "Take the Happy Hour Taste Tour" offering sampler plates for $2.99 up until 6:00 p.m. (Thanks Janice for your suggestion!) Sounds like a great place to meet before a movie.

Sample a wide range of Joe's legendary tastes without ruining your budget. Buffalo–Caribbean Chicken Tenders, Rhode Island Style Calamari, Forno Baked Chicken Quesadilla, Short Rib Slider, Mini-Pizzas and many more!

We'll first meet at the bar/lounge at Not Your Average Joe's for light bites, or choose to enjoy a full dinner. Whatever your preference! The Movie to follow is at Regal Cape Cod Mall Stadium 12, 793 Route 132, Hyannis.

Not Your Average Joe's, located at the Cape Cod Mall, offers what's called: "Take the Happy Hour Taste Tour" offering sampler plates for $2.99 up until 6:00 p.m. (Thanks Janice for your suggestion!) Sounds like a great place to meet before a movie.

Sample a wide range of Joe's legendary tastes without ruining your budget. Buffalo–Caribbean Chicken Tenders, Rhode Island Style Calamari, Forno Baked Chicken Quesadilla, Short Rib Slider, Mini-Pizzas and many more!

We'll first meet at the bar/lounge at Not Your Average Joe's for light bites, or choose to enjoy a full dinner. Whatever your preference! The Movie to follow is at Regal Cape Cod Mall Stadium 12, 793 Route 132, Hyannis.

MOVIE: 17 Again

Mike O'Donnell (Matthew Perry) was a high-school basketball star with a bright future. But he threw it all away to marry his girlfriend and raise their child. Almost 20 years later, Mike's marriage has failed, his kids think he's a loser, and his job is going nowhere. He gets a chance to correct the mistakes of his past and change his life when he is miraculously transformed back into a teenager (Zac Efron), but in trying to fix his past, Mike may be jeopardizing his present and future.

* Cast: Zac Efron, Leslie Mann, Thomas Lennon, Matthew Perry, Tyler Steelman
* Director: Burr Steers
* Genres: Fantasy Comedy, Teen Movie, Comedy


It starts at 7:20 p.m. Runtime: 1 hr. 42 minutes. Movie price: $8.50


NOTE: If any of you ladies would prefer to see a different movie for yourself, I'll bring a movie list with show times to Not Your Average Joe's, or you can look it up on the internet at:

NOTE: If you want to just make the lite bites at TGI Fridays and not attend a movie that's fine too!
item.how_to_find_us: The crazy blonde with a pin that says, "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!"

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Happy Hour Bites at Not Your Average Joes with a Movie to Follow!
